backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no backend logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing features, related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing purposes of various frontend files and assets.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color variables and theme tokens for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting base href and mounting the React app.
frontend/public/.well-known/ic-domains: Domain verification file listing the allowed icp0.io domain.
frontend/SMOKE_TEST_PRODUCTION.md: Production smoke‑test checklist covering routing, asset loading, diagnostics, and IC deployment behavior.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and normalizes BASE_URL for IC‑compatible routing.
frontend/src/components/DebugImagesPanel: Empty placeholder file for debugging image rendering.
frontend/src/components/FaujiIcon.tsx: Renders cropped sections of the icon sprite to display shield, flag, handshake, or rupee icons.
Empty placeholder for the gallery lightbox component.
frontend/src/components/ImageWithFallbac: Image component that shows a styled fallback when loading fails and resets error state on src change.
frontend/src/components/ProductionDiagno: Debug panel showing BASE_URL and resolved core asset URLs for production troubleshooting.
frontend/src/components/SectionHeading.t: Reusable section header with optional subtitle and description supporting alignment and custom styling.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Renders the site footer with branding, quick links, contact details, and a credits bar.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Provides a responsive header with logo, navigation links, and a mobile menu drawer.
frontend/src/components/SiteLayout.tsx: Defines the main page layout including header, footer, content outlet, sticky contact bar, and optional diagnostics.
frontend/src/components/StickyContactBar: Displays a mobile-only bottom bar with quick call and WhatsApp buttons.
frontend/src/content/faujiFinanceContent: Exports static content for hero, about, team, representatives, services, why-choose points, and contact info.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and utilities for Internet Identity login, logout, identity management, and auth client setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file indicating no backend queries are needed.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and custom Fauji Finance color system with light/dark theme variables.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Renders a styled contact page with hero text, call/WhatsApp CTAs, and team contact sections using CONTACT and REPRESENTATIVES data.
frontend/src/pages/GalleryPage.tsx: Empty placeholder file for a gallery page with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Builds the homepage with hero, about, services highlights, contact CTAs, and Google Maps integration using content constants.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Displays a services hero, services grid sourced from SERVICES data, and supplemental documents and process steps.
frontend/src/pages/TeamPage.tsx: Empty placeholder file for a team page with no implemented content.
frontend/src/utils/debugImages.ts: Empty utility file intended for image debugging hooks but currently contains no logic.
frontend/src/utils/googleMaps.ts: Provides utility functions to generate Google Maps search and embed URLs from an address.
frontend/src/utils/publicAssetUrl.ts: Builds normalized asset URLs using BASE_URL, handling absolute URLs and removing double slashes.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, Fauji color palette, fonts, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks project state, design notes, issues, and feature requirements for the Fauji Finance website.
